/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, is lined with a variety of buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the cityscape. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the urban environment and the natural elements within it.
